price: 35. Puis après que son innocence fut manifestement prouvée, il leur sembla bon de l’emprisonner pour quelque temps.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
